channel.title: Npc issues! o.O making em hit all surronding players
channel.description: yh title says all i want to make an npc hit all surrounding players randomly. like i know this would be very simple like hitDouble(int, absY, absX +misc.random[10]) for example, iunno i thats right or not, but where exactly would i make those changes? :/ or would it be like adding a new type of hit, e.g dragonfire/ kbd ice breath, stuff like that i know how to work with. o and btw this is 317 delta.

item.title: Npc issues! o.O making em hit all surronding players
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

explain lil more pwease? i nvr did any looping b4, most of it like bandos was pre added but i cant get nythin to work. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2009, 05:06:25 pm[/size][hr]edit, soz i meant loopinng the hits, or i probably could have figured this out, and would i add this under the uhm npchandler? possibly with uhm… the max hit statsments or w.e, wait one min lemme re check to c if bandos is in here >.<[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2009, 05:10:15 pm[/size][hr]this is the only thing udner npchandler i found related to bandos boss except for max hit, hit ratio or w.e, and npc following :

npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 1833; } else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1115 && misc.random(3)==1) {

idk if that possibly means anyone in 3 squares radius of him gets hit once of its regular hit?

Read full topic
item.source: Npc issues! o.O making em hit all surronding players

item.title: Npc issues! o.O making em hit all surronding players
item.dc:creator: @Zach_93 Zach 93
item.description:
@Zach_93 wrote:

Loop all players in the same map region as the monster (you could loop all of them, but that wouldn’t be efficient no would it?), check their distance, and deal damage accordingly.

Read full topic
